# 1995 TVZ Awards

| network = Multishow
| ratings =
| previous = 1994
| main = TVZ Awards
| next = 1996
}}
The 1995 TVZ Awards (), later renamed the Multishow Brazilian Music Awards (Portuguese: Prêmio Multishow de Música Brasileira), were held on 30 May 1995, at the Ballroom in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil. Mylena Ciribelli hosted the ceremony.
Winners
The following individuals have won awards:
{| class="wikitable" style="width="
! scope="col" width="50%" style="background:#EEDD85;"| Best Male Singer
! scope="col" width="50%" style="background:#EEDD85;"| Best Female Singer
|-

| style="vertical-align:top"|
* Daniela Mercury
|-

! scope="col" width="50%" style="background:#EEDD85;"| New Artist
|-
| style="vertical-align:top"|
* Skank
| style="vertical-align:top"|
* Banda Mel
|-
! colspan="2" scope="col" width="50%" style="background:#EEDD85;"| Best Music Video
|-
| colspan="2" style="vertical-align:top"|
* "É Proibido Fumar" – Skank
|}
